=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement: Lab Safety Campaign**

**Reference Information:**

* Reference Number: cb-5137-40785770
* Amendment Number: 3
* Solicitation Number: 23-58007
* Publication Date: 2023-05-02
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-09T14:00:00

**Overview:**

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) is seeking proposals for a Lab Safety Campaign. The successful bidder will provide a comprehensive plan to enhance laboratory safety, aligned with the NRC's Health, Safety, and Environment Branch (HSE) policies.

**Scope of Work:**

The scope of this campaign will include:

* Developing and implementing policies, procedures, and training programs to enhance laboratory safety
* Conducting risk assessments and analysis of existing safety protocols
* Providing expert advice on health, safety, and environmental matters

**Main Interested Parties:**

* National Research Council of Canada (NRC)
* Companies providing laboratory services and equipment

**Procurement Method:**

The procurement method for this tender is Competitive - Open Bidding.

**Key Dates:**

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-06-09T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-06-19
* Expected Contract End Date: 2025-03-31

**Contact Information:**

* Contracting Entity: National Research Council of Canada
* Contact Name: Roxanne Azzi Abboud
* Contact Email: [Roxanne.AzziAbboud@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Roxanne.AzziAbboud@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)

The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal and Questions and Answers, can be downloaded from [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5137/](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5137/). The tender notices are also available in French on the same website.
